Documentation for pageget¶

Contents

  • Documentation for pageget
    • Syntax
    • License

Just a wrapper for wget which will attempt to download an HTML page and all resources from the same domain at the same or lower level within the directory structure on the HTTP server. This is mostly intended to download HTML ebooks and things of a similar format.

Syntax¶

$1 . . . URL to download

$2 . . . website's domain
